mapper.select: select content_code `contentCode`, techblog_code `techblogCode`, content_title `contentTitle`, content_text `contentText`, content_url `contentUrl`, content_img `contentImg`, content_date `contentDate`, content_keyword `contentKeyword` from content where content_code = #{contentCode}

select content_code `contentCode`, techblog_code `techblogCode`, content_title `contentTitle`, content_text `contentText`, content_url `contentUrl`, content_img `contentImg`, content_date `contentDate`, content_keyword `contentKeyword` from content
where
content_keyword like concat('%',#{item},'%')
and (content_code < #{lastContentCode})
order by content_date desc
order by content_read desc
limit #{size}
mapper.insert: insert into contentlike (user_code, content_code, content_like_date) values (#{uid}, #{cid}, now())
insert into contentscrap (user_code, content_code, content_scrap_time) values (#{uid}, #{cid}, now())
insert into contentread (user_code, content_code, content_read_date) values (#{uid}, #{cid}, now())
mapper.select: select coalesce((select 1 FROM contentlike where user_code = #{userCode} and content_code = #{contentCode}), 0)
select coalesce((select 1 FROM contentscrap where user_code = #{userCode} and content_code = #{contentCode}), 0)
